page.title: 19Whitley C.P.School
page.content: {Whitley School}was built in l875 with a house for the teacher. It began with l child. In l985 it has 58 pupils of 5 to ll years from Whitley and Dutton. There is a Headteacher, 2.4 assistant teachers and three classes. All pupils except 4 have cooked Dinners at midday We learn Maths and English,and work on topics which include these and History Geography,Science,Poetry,R.E., and Art and Craft. On Mondays we have Singing, on Tuesdays we have Swimming and Computer Club.The Vicar comes for R.E. on Wednesdays and later we have Games. After school there is Dance Club. On Thursdays we have Recorders and Craft and on Friday we change our Library books. We produce plays for parents at Christmas and in July and take part in Assemblies and at Harvest Festival. We go on a week's visit in the Spring with another Small School. See page 20
